## Analysis table 

|                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Researchers                 | Medical College of Georgia at Augusta University (lead authors : Dr. Wei Xiao, Dr. Mumtaz Rojiani, Dr. Amyn Rojiani)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Published in                | ScienceDaily, 23 September 2019                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| General topic               | The way cancerous cells avoid apoptosis (non-small cell lung cancer)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Procedure/what was examined | goal was to evidence link between TIMP-1 and resistance to chemotherapy + they used two drugs to destroy TIMP-1, then also destroy it by antibodies + added TIMP-1 to see the effect, then added IL-6  + STAT3 : regulator of gene activity (cell growth,division,  movement, apoptosis)                                                                                  |
| Conclusions/discovery       | high rate of TIMP-1 increases rate of IL-6 which make cells avoid apoptosis + low rate of TIMP-1 => lower rate of IL-6 => more apoptosis of cancerous cells => higher survival rate for patients + adding IL-6 has no real effect on apoptosis + remaining cancerous cells are more resistant + high level of IL-6 => STAT3 moves to nucleus => helps to reduce apoptosis |
| Remaining questions         | Does STAT3 activate more TIMP-1 production ?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
